compatibility.notes: ErlPL-1.1 allows for linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: You must comply with the terms of the Erlang Public License when using, modifying, or distributing the Covered Code.
You must provide access to the source code when distributing Executables derived from the Covered Code.
license.name: ErlPL-1.1
obligations: You must include a copy of this license in all distributions of the Covered Code.
You must include a copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the Covered Code.
You must state changes made to the Covered Code when distributing it.
